bibl.title: On Medinet Habu Ostracon 4038.
bibl.note: This demotic agreement [ed.: Richard A. Parker, A Late Demotic Gardening Agreement. Medinet Habu Ostracon 4038, ibidem 26 (1940) pp. 84-113 et pll. XVII-XX] contains references to the coinage used during the later time of the Principate (near A.D. 271). It is not likely that the gold pieces were issued by the queen Zenobia.
bibl.seg: Heichelheim Fritz M., On Medinet Habu Ostracon 4038.
